system.description: When you choose this archetype at 2nd level, you gain proficiency in either cook’s utensils or brewer’s supplies. You may also use what some would call unusual implements as your spellcasting focus. Choose one implement from the toolkit chosen, such as a kitchen knife, wooden spoon, rolling pin, or other similar object. This item counts as a spellcasting focus for you. If your focus is lost or destroyed, it may be replaced as a ritual that takes 10 minutes and 5 gp of natural materials you would use in your practice (such as dried cooking herbs and wood from a cooking fire).
